TopicTitle: To every Planet/ Moon and back!

Articles.Content:
Heres a challenge for you guys.

Construct an Interplanetary ship that is capable of going to every planet/moon and back to kerbin.

Easy

No mods EXCEPT Mechjeb, Kosmos, and FASA.

You must use ONE lander and only one lander, to land on every planet and moon. This lander must be able to land on something simple as minmus, to the unforgiving Tylo.

Plant a flag on every planet you visit

You Cannot send out fuel ships. It cannot be refueled by anything.

Thats 'easy mode'

Hard mode is using Krags Planet mod.

You must visit ALL these planets, including the Vanilla ones.

No mods except : Kerbal Flight Engineer

Hardcore mode. Using the one lander, visit every biome! (You can use a Refueler consisting of orange tanks depending on the planet/moon)

(This counts for all difficulties except Easy)

Minmus - None

Mun - None

Eve- 5 Orange tanks

Duna 3 orange tanks

Ike - None

Moho- 1 Orange tank

Dres - 1 Grey tank

Jool - None (As you Cannot land on Jool)

Laythe - 3 Orange tanks

Bop - 1 Half grey

Pol - 1 Grey

Vall - 1 Half Grey

Tylo - 7 Orange tanks

Thank you guys. I know this may/may not be a difficult challenge, but hey it's a challenge.

YOU MUST POST PICTURES AS PROOF.

(May update this)

This has been done so many times though, even i had a challenge like this. Difference is i did the challenge before even posting the challenge lol

Maybe some one will do it but i am gonna skip
